text: Joseph Marie Régis Belzile (13 April 1931 - 4 September 2018) was a Chadian Canadian Roman Catholic bishop. Belzile was born in Canada and was ordained to the priesthood in 1961. He served as bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Moundou, Chad, from 1975 to 1985.Diocese of Moundou ==Notes== Category:1931 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Canadian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Chadian Roman Catholic bishops
title: Joseph Marie Régis Belzile
